Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at GHOTEL hotel & living Hannover in Hannover (Gross Buchholz), you'll be close to Hannover Medical School and New Town Hall. This hotel is within close proximity of Hannover Zoo and Eilenriede Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 325 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request irons/ironing boards.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities including a sauna and bicycles to rent. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of GHOTEL hotel & living Hannover. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. This hotel has 19 meeting rooms available for events.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of GHOTEL hotel & living Hannover. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Hannover Medical School - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Hannover Zoo - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Eilenriede Stadium - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Hannover Congress Centrum - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Tiergarten Hannover - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Lister Platz - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Commedia Futura Theater - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Foro Artistico - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Schauspiel Hannover - 3.7 km / 2.3 mi
SpielBank Hannover - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Opera House - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Ernst August Galerie - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Aegidienkirche - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
KUBUS Municipal Gallery - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Lower Saxony State Museum - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi

The preferred airport for GHOTEL hotel & living Hannover is Hannover (HAJ) - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Ghotel Hotel & Living Hannover is Hannover (HAJ-Hannover Airport) - 11.4 km / 7.1 mi.
